argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | drngid.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | drngid.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | drngid.u | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | drngid.g | |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_drngring | |- ( R e. DivRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7, 3 | #P_unitgrpid | |- ( R e. Ring -> .1. = ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. DivRing -> .1. = ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 6, 2 | #P_isdrng | |- ( R e. DivRing <-> ( R e. Ring /\ ( Unit ` R ) = ( B \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_simprbi | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( Unit ` R ) = ( B \ { .0. } ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12, 4 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) = G ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( R e. DivRing -> .1. = ( 0g ` G ) ) |
